moves.1. e4: Let the guy castle and then attack his kingside- more entertainment than education. Blitzkrieg- works some times. The key was sacrificing a pawn to get his strong defensive bishop. Josep and I have had some good games. Enjoy.
moves.4... Be7 5. d3 O-O: he castles- i am in a dangerous mood. Plan to attack his kingside- fasten your seat belts.
moves.6. Be3 Bg4 7. h3 Bh5 8. g4: pawn storm- my intentions are revealed
moves.8... Bg6: could still end in grief for me
moves.9. g5 Nfd7 10. Nh4: this is the key move for me- i could have advanced my h pawn to protect my g pawn but his bishop on g row was too strong for me
moves.11. Nxg6: he has to take it with the h pawn
moves.11... hxg6: now to advance the h pawn
moves.14... Nc6 15. h5 gxh5 16. Rxh5 Nd4 17. O: no problem, coz my d-rook will go to h1
moves.18. Rdh1: i dont get the q over to the h row yet, better to advance the 2 rooks right down the h file and the q will come in later
moves.18... g6 19. Rh5h8+ Kg7 20. Rh1h7+: next my knight will go to f6, he will go to e6, my queen will come to h3 etc. he resigns.
